main event: A saucer-shaped object, approximately 200-300 feet in diameter, appeared out of the clouds, hovered momentarily, and then disappeared back into the clouds.
interesting points: The object had 20 evenly spaced windows, except for a gap of two.
The object had a dull silver color and made no sound.
The object hovered for a few minutes before rapidly accelerating and disappearing from sight.
The witness used binoculars to get a closer look at the object, which had a solid, metallic-like appearance and was self-luminous.
Several other people also witnessed the object in the sky.
